data.user-invite-success-email-activation-not:
Hey {userFullName},

This app makes our workspace even more comfortable. Here you can {noteOptions}. Now you have a full control of important workflows.

To get started, just sign in with your email {userEmail}.
If you have any questions, feel free to contact the branch manager. Enjoy!
